Html:
Hi

The release actually available is targetting x86. If I have understood, it was for easier debugging (edit & continue anyone ? :) )
Could you release a "AnyCPU" version ?
Also, would it be possible to have this available on nuget platform (v0.9 actually)

Thanks.

I will provide the next version in AnyCPU. I simply forgot to switch. And yes, it is because edit and continue. ;)

At the moment supporting nuget has very low priority to me. Not as long as the people find that many bugs.

Regards,
Torsten
